CustomField.description: Displays the Amount from the Impacted Opportunity if it is a closed won Opportunity and if the Opportunity Generated from Clinical Prog box is checked
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Impacted_Opportunity__r.IsWon = TRUE, Opportunity_Generated_From_Clinical_Prog__c = TRUE ), Impacted_Opportunity__r.Amount, 0)
CustomField.label: Related Opp Won Amount
